channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Apollo published a slide deck arguing that the reduction in imports would be enough to trigger a recession in the U.S. starting in the summer.

item.title: Hawley reignites 'PELOSI Act' push to ban lawmakers from trading stocks
item.description: Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo., reintroduced his "PELOSI Act" seeking to ban lawmakers from making stock trades while they are in office on Monday.
